summary: REQ-38 requires saving the uploaded UPI QR code image as frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.png and rendering it at /assets/generated/upi-qr.png in PaywallModal. The diff shows PaywallModal.tsx was modified and the file summary mentions the new QR image path, but the image file itself (upi-qr.png) is not present in the diff as an added file. Additionally, the path used in the implementation appears to be /assets/generated/upi-qr.dim_600x700.png rather than the required /assets/generated/upi-qr.png.

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the uploaded UPI QR code image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.png and render it using the path /assets/generated/upi-qr.png in PaywallModal
missing_requirements.reason: No binary/image file was added in the diff (ADDED FILES: none). The static asset file frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.png is not present as an added file. Furthermore, the frontend-file-summaries.txt indicates the PaywallModal uses /assets/generated/upi-qr.dim_600x700.png instead of the required /assets/generated/upi-qr.png.
